## JsonFile.convertJsonFileSync() function

Read a JSON file and apply a supplied converter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function convertJsonFileSync<T, TC = unknown>(srcPath: string, converter: Converter<T, TC>): Result<T>;
```
